name: ROLL IT (Theory Team)
description:
The first game that was made by Theory Team.

It was released as a Beta version in 2016, and remastered as an asset in 2018.

The gameplay is about a rolling ball which should make its way through the end of every stage; each stage has a different type of ball and a different types of obstacles and barriers.

You can check the asset on Unity Asset Store through the following link:

https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/roll-it-100345
